name: Scratch Wars_ save griffpatch (games & art)
description:
Use full screen!! :)

(To hard? press s to skip a level)

Works on mobile phone ( tap to move )

Arrow keys to move r to refresh a level 

Try to collect 3 stars in each level

i'll make Scratch War 2 if you leave a ❤, thanks!! :D

If there're strange bugs then repress the green flag and open the full screen
